body:
As some of you might already know... I'm leaving for Bulgaria. There,  I probably won't have much internet to go on the forums or Skype, but i'll try at least once every few days.
I'm returning near the beginning of July.
(As for my map, Peachy has the download, so I will talk to him about the edits.)

So... Erm.... Bai! :D

title: My Trip

replies.body: I've heard Bulgaria has great internet

replies.body: By internet, i mostly mean the ping to avicus, and the 5 fps computer we have there.
